Nkesa aridity n'oge ọ bụla bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ihi mgbasa nke ikuku
Nke ikpeazụ na-agbanwe nke ukwuu ka oge na-aga site na mgbanwe ihu igwe
Omumaatu mmụba okpomọkụ site na pasent 1.52.1 gafee Naịl Basin n'ime afọ 30 na-esote nwere ike ịgbanwe mpaghara ahụ site na ala kpọrọ nkụ gaa na ala kpọrọ mmiri, na-ebelata ala a ga-eji rụọ ọrụ ugbo
Na ngbakwunye ala eme ihe nwere ike ịbawanye mkpa maka mmiri ala ma si otú ahụ mee ka mmiri kpọọ nkụ.
